title: Rogers connection causing 180+ ping
body:
Recently, the greater Toronto area rogers connections have been receiving pings of over 180 ms. Everywhere from downtown to the rural areas are being affected by this issue, and the cause is unknown. Not sure whether it is rogers' service, riot servers, or something in between, but to go from 25 ping to 180+ is quite odd, especially when all other sites seem to work fine. 

Any help on the topic would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: just lost a ranked game because of this. thanks Rogers.
Tested my ping on everybody's favourite ping tester speedtest.net and it said my ping was 10. Go into Ranked game and it's 160 on average. So disappointing.

Yeah this is Riot

everything else works fine for me
HALP RITO I NEED MY FIX
its not just rogers, my friend has fido and i have rogers we both lagged out at 180-200 ms at around 6:30ish and lost , but my other friend who has bell was fine
fido is owned by rogers they are the same isp
yea, having the same problem now
Hopefully it fixes by tomorrow at the latest.
yea and its like only for league, my roommate is playin hon is fine
I am still having this issue: toronto with teksavvy
im fine and i live just 20 min outside toronot so u just suck

Hey guys, yeah I'm seeing quite a few ISP issues being reported here this morning.  Is the issue still going on for you?

If so, download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute to 104.160.131.1.  Run it for a few minutes and post it here.  It will give us a better understanding of what exactly is going on.  Thanks!

Also, another issue that I ran into during this period of time was when I queued up with friends, almost half of the time, one person would press accept on the match, but would never be transferred into the lobby, even though everyone else was. Furthermore, when trying to change masteries, runes, or summoner spells, the occasional "Failed to change ___" would appear and then nothing could be changed, even though chat was still updating and useable, nothing else could be changed.

It was happening yesterday afternoon into the evening, however the later it got, the more it seemed to be off and on. At about 10 pm EST, the games would be half 180+ ping half 25. As of now, I do not think the issues persists, however if it does happen again, should I reply here or create a new thread?
